MissionText.name: The Art of Spinjitzu
MissionText.description: Hold the attack button to charge your new Spinjitzu weapon - then release to unleash Spinjitzu. Show me now!

MissionText.name: The Power of Spinjitzu
MissionText.description: Use Spinjitzu to smash 10 Skeleton Miners in the Maelstrom Quarry on Crux Prime.

MissionText.name: The Scrolls of Ninjago
MissionText.description: Search Crux Prime until you find all 10 of Neido's scrolls.

MissionText.name: The Legend of Ninjago
MissionText.description: Interact with Neido's shrine to read his scrolls.

MissionText.name: Bone Fractures
MissionText.description: Use a ranged weapon to destroy 10 of the Skeletons' Bone Fracture Bombs in the Maelstrom Quarry.

MissionText.name: Bang Your Skulls!
MissionText.description: Smash and then rebuild 3 Skeleton Growlspeakers in the Maelstrom Quarry.

MissionText.name: Destroy the Drill!
MissionText.description: Smash a Skeleton Drilling Rig in the Maelstrom Quarry. Use Spinjitzu to reveal its weakness!

targetNames.name: AM - Skeleton Drill Center Moving platform

MissionText.name: Skeleton Tech
MissionText.description: Topple Skeleton Watchtowers, smash the Skeleton Watchmen that fall out, then collect 6 schematic pages.

MissionText.name: Nuckal Cracker
MissionText.description: Find a Maelstrom Crystal by smashing Nuckal, the Skeleton General on Crux Prime.

MissionText.name: For All the Tea in Ninjago
MissionText.description: Water 10 Aura Blossoms on Crux Prime and bring the petals to Neido.

MissionText.name: Goodbye Griffy
MissionText.description: Smash Skeleton Pit Bosses on Crux Prime until you find Neido's Hello Griffy doll.

MissionText.name: Engineers of Destruction
MissionText.description: Smash 3 Skeleton Engineers in the Maelstrom Quarry on Crux Prime.

MissionText.name: Skullduggery
MissionText.description: Perform a Pet Dig at the far end of the Maelstrom Quarry, then tame the Pet that appears.

MissionText.name: Bony Little Thing
MissionText.description: Go to Pet Cove and talk to Coalessa about the Skeleton Dragon Pet.

MissionText.name: Dark Science
MissionText.description: Take the Maelstrom Crystal to Echs Ray, the Paradox Scientist in Forbidden Valley.

MissionText.name: Unavailable
MissionText.description: Unavailable

MissionText.name: Mining Marauder
MissionText.description: Smash 2 Skeleton Drilling Rigs, 2 Skeleton Watchtowers and 4 Bone Fracture Bombs on Crux Prime.

MissionText.name: Ninja Avenger
MissionText.description: Smash 15 Skeleton Miners, 6 Skeleton Engineers and 3 Skeleton Pit Bosses on Crux Prime.

MissionText.name: Breaking Ranks
MissionText.description: Smash 2 Skeleton Pit Bosses and 6 Skeleton Watchmen on Crux Prime.

MissionText.name: Your Spinjitzu is Strong
MissionText.description: Smash 2 Skeleton Drilling Rigs, 15 Skeleton Miners and rebuild 5 Skeleton Growlspeakers on Crux Prime.

MissionText.name: Compound Fracture
MissionText.description: Smash 4 Bone Fracture Bombs, 6 Skeleton Watchmen and rebuild 5 Skeleton Growlspeakers on Crux Prime.

MissionText.name: I Am the Egg Man
MissionText.description: Talk to Coalessa in Pet Cove about the egg.
